result.title: Invitation to Alkhwarizm, 2015
result.content:
Hello!

I would like to invite you all to the annual online coding event of Indian Institute of Information Technology, Allahabad. Platform of the event will be HackerEarth. Link- Alkhwarizm.
It will be a 5 hour long contest starting at 7:00 PM IST, 21st March, 2015. Our team of setters, testers and organizers consists of- Mayank Tuteja (mayank99), Vipul Mehta (Xeronix), Divanshu Garg (divanshu), Yogesh Sharma, Prateek Gupta (Xsquare), Pranjul Dubey (pranjuldb) and Shiva Bhalla (hellgeek).
Please do participate in one of the most prestigious coding events in India.
